pages.text: Crushing stones in the $(l:machines/piston_crusher)Piston Crusher$() or by $(l:tools/hammers)Hammers$() will yield Cobblestone and a few primary products: feldspar, olivine, and pyrozene. These components can be used to craft new stones.

pages.title: Stone Creation
pages.text: Crushed stone components can be used to create new stones. Example using anorthosite above.
